title: Revolut Sees U.K. Banking License Paving Way for Potential IPO, Expansion
body: The fintech was valued at $45 billion in an oversubscribed secondary share sale, which sets a floor for its valuation ahead of any IPO and puts it on par with the likes of NatWest and Deutsche Bank.

title: Revolut Review For 2025
body: Revolut offers a savings account, prepaid cards to manage daily finances and investment accounts. Ideal for travelers and young people, Revolut makes it easy to convert money into different currencies,
